headline: Public Service Enterprise to Release Q4 Earnings: What's in Store?
summary: PEG heads into Q4 with data center-driven demand and rate gains set to lift revenues, though higher costs may pressure earnings.

headline: CenterPoint Energy, Inc. Announces Pricing of Upsized Offering of $600 Million of 2.875% Convertible Senior Notes Due 2029
summary: HOUSTON, February 24, 2026--CenterPoint Energy, Inc. (NYSE: CNP) or "CenterPoint" today announced the pricing of its offering of $600 million aggregate principal amount of its 2.875% Convertible Senior Notes due 2029 (the "convertible notes") in a private placement to persons reasonably believed to be qualified institutional buyers pursuant to Rule 144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act"). The size of the offering was increased from the previously announced $550 m
